title: Lake Nakuru Wildlife Photography Workshop
description: Join professional photographers for a hands-on workshop in Lake Nakuru National Park. Learn advanced techniques for capturing wildlife, landscapes, and bird photography. Workshop includes equipment rental, guided safari drives, and post-processing sessions.
shortDescription: Professional wildlife photography workshop in Lake Nakuru

title: Traditional Dhow Sailing Experience
description: Experience the ancient art of dhow sailing along the Kenyan coast. Learn traditional sailing techniques, enjoy fresh seafood lunch on board, and explore hidden coves and pristine beaches. Perfect for families and adventure seekers.
shortDescription: Traditional dhow sailing adventure along the Kenyan coast

title: Lamu Cultural Festival
description: Experience traditional Swahili culture, music, and dhow races in the historic Lamu Island. This annual festival celebrates the rich heritage of the Swahili coast with traditional dance, poetry, and cultural exhibitions.
shortDescription: Experience traditional Swahili culture, music, and dhow races.

title: Nairobi Food & Wine Festival
description: Taste authentic Kenyan cuisine and international flavors from top chefs and local vendors. Features cooking demonstrations, wine tastings, and food competitions.
shortDescription: Taste authentic Kenyan cuisine and international flavors.

title: East Africa Tech Summit
description: Network with tech entrepreneurs and investors from across East Africa. Features keynote speakers, startup pitches, and technology exhibitions.
shortDescription: Network with tech entrepreneurs and investors.

title: Rhino Charge
description: Annual off-road motorsport event that raises funds for rhino conservation. Teams navigate through challenging terrain in a timed competition.
shortDescription: Off-road motorsport event supporting rhino conservation.

title: Kenya Business Conference
description: Annual conference bringing together business leaders, entrepreneurs, and investors to discuss economic opportunities in Kenya and East Africa.
shortDescription: Business leaders conference on economic opportunities.

title: Maasai Cultural Day
description: Immerse yourself in traditional Maasai culture with authentic dances, ceremonies, and cultural practices in a traditional village setting.
shortDescription: Experience authentic Maasai culture and traditions.
